column4: Do you still remember how we used to be
column5: 你还记得我们过去一起有过的感受
column7: 不管发生什么事情都互相信任
column8: My love has said to me
column10: Both of us were dreamers Young love in the sun
column11: 我们是梦想者 是阳光下年轻的爱
column12: Felt like my saviour My spirit I gave you
column13: 你就像我的救世主 我把我的灵魂交给你
column18: Viva Forever I ll be waiting
column26: Yes I still remember every whispered word
column27: 是的 我还记得你轻声耳语的每个字
column28: The touch of your skin giving life from within
column29: 你的碰触让我从内到外苏醒
column30: Like a love song that I ve heard
column31: 像一首我听过的爱情歌曲
column32: Slipping through our fingers like the sands of time
column33: 时间像从指间滑过的沙子
column40: Viva Forever I ll be waiting
column48: But we re all alone was it just a dream
column49: 但我们是孤独的 因为这只是个梦
column50: Feelings untold They will never be sold
column51: 百味杂陈 这些梦永远不会实现
column52: And the secrets safe with me
column53: 我小心翼翼保管着我们的秘密
column56: Viva Forever I ll be waiting
